recipe.title: Greek Salad
recipe.comment: you can replace spring onions with a red onion. However, this will no longer be FODMAP friendly.

part.title: Main
part.ingredient: 2 Lebanese cucumbers peeled, de-seeded and chopped
1 red, or yellow capsicum chopped (can be omitted)
part.step: Place all ingredients in a bowl, except dressing ingredients and stir well.
Place dressing ingredients in a small jar and shake well.
Pour contents of dressing over salad and mix to combine.

part.title: Dressing
part.step: Place all ingredients in a bowl, except dressing ingredients and stir well.
Place dressing ingredients in a small jar and shake well.
Pour contents of dressing over salad and mix to combine.
Ps if you prefer you can replace spring onions with a red onion ( However, this will no longer be FODMAP friendly.)
